features: PU leather + soft washed canvas is not only comfortable to the touch, but also more durable and tear-resistant for a more upscale look! The inner pocket compartment is made of a better fabric material than most on the market!

Size: 13.0*11.4*4.3 inches (L*H*W). The enlarged design can accommodate laptops or other electronic devices up to 13 inches. This shoulder bag is not a big computer backpack, but just the right size design, it is an ideal bag for daily traveling or shopping in life! The shoulder backpack can be adjusted the way the backpack is accustomed to with the left and right metal buckles. Weight: about 810 grams, strap adjustable range: about 40-60 inches

Our multi-functional vintage backpack has 11 pockets for reasonable compartmentalized storage. 1 zippered pocket on the flap. 1 zippered pocket and 1 open pocket under the flap; 2 side pockets. The main zipper pocket is equipped with two pockets: 1 inner zipper pocket; 1 internal iPad pocket; small pocket on the inner flap for power bank; 1 anti-theft zipper pocket on the back for ID card, bank card or wallet and cell phone!

Stylish, unisex and simple retro design, perfect for college, work, dating, shopping, or daily travel out and about shoulder bag, multi-capacity design can also be used for hiking, running, biking or camping and other outdoor activities;

The buckles of the backpack are metal buckles, very texture! The top flap buckle is a magnetic buckle, easy to open and close, very convenient for loading and unloading! The shoulder straps are widened and made of soft fabric, so you can carry it for a long time without getting tired!
body.description: This crossbody messenger bag highlights the craftsmanship, canvas look simple and advanced, multi-functional multi-pocket compartment to keep personal belongings safe. Ideal for travel, camping, hiking, trekking or business trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits my iPad and all my other stuff. Love all the pockets. Easy to carry and comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find, great price!
reviews.reviewText: SUMMARY – Great little bag, especially at a $20 price point. There's nothing fancy here, but solid workmanship, quality materials, and lots of pockets make this bag a clear winner!QUALITY – I've just received my bag, so can't speak to how it will hold up. That said, the construction and materials feel top notch. The canvas, straps, lining, zippers, and furnishings all feel sturdy and high quality. The fit and finish of the bag appears high quality and gives the impression the bag will stand the test of time.DETAILS – I bought this bag for two very specific purposes and will be carrying it with another laptop bag. Unfortunately, my main bag is too fancy to carry my water bottle and too slim to carry lots of paperwork. * The side pocket here is just big enough to carry my 0.7L CamelBak bottle (roughly 2.5" in diameter). The fit is snug, but not so snug that sliding in or out is a hassle. However, the elastic opening closes up enough that putting the bottle in takes a second hand to hold the pocket open. Between the elastic closure and the depth of this pocket (about 5.5"), there's no danger of my bottle falling out. * The inside compartment just barely holds a couple of thick letter-sized folders, although they do bend just a bit at the top corner where the bag narrows slightly. I think for most folks this compartment will be plenty spacious, but I was specifically concerned about file folders and notebooks. * There are plenty of other pockets, although they're all a bit generic. One or two of the inner pockets have a divider, but most of the pockets are just there for your stuff. This setup ensures maximum flexibility, but could be a frustration for those of you who like lots of individuals nooks and crannies. Your stuff may end up swimming around in there.STYLE – The price is a steal for what you get, which got me thinking about the two broad ways manufacturers keep costs down. One, sadly, is to use the cheapest possible materials and workmanship. The alternative, is to use quality materials and avoid unnecessary, stylistic frills. This bag very much feels like the latter. As a whole, the bag has a utilitarian vibe. It's not exactly un-stylish, but style wasn't what they were going for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mens sling bag.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband to use when we fly. Our iPad and 2 sets of headphones fit nicely. Even room for a book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek. Well made
reviews.reviewText: Love the waterproof material. Seems sturdy. Nice size of being wearable but having decent storage. Gave as a gift and it was a hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome medium size bag.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I carry a backpack almost everywhere and this bag is a great option when taking just a few things. It's made from canvas and is really comfortable after adjustment. Lots of pockets and 1 is hidden in the back so it can't be seen while worn. Perfect place to put your cash or phone to thwart pickpockets. Zippers seem really sturdy and the inside is big enough for a couple changes of clothes or enough supplies for a day hike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and i bought 2 electric bikes over the summer, as i have never been a big purse girl, we needed something to hold our things as we rode. This bag was bought for my husband, he loves it. He's 51 so its great at any age. It holds our wallets, snacks and water bottles fine. It has lots of compartments so you can store multiple kinds of things in there while you are riding. We love it and it totally worked how we needed it to for our needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sling bag A
reviews.reviewText: This is a great sling bag, only thing I would change is the pocket on the back that sits against your back needs to be bigger and not have a liner that comes out when you remove your item. I would suggest making that pocket the same size as the bag with longer zipper. Also if a secure zipper could be used ot a clip type zipper for that back pocket would be great. That would help if you truly wanted a secure place for a small tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size in description is misleading
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to use as a small backpack.I don't carry much and just needed it to hold an 11 inch work laptop, and my 13.3 inch laptop. My 13.3 inch laptop is 12.24 inches long on the side that would go vertically in the bag, which is less than 13 inches. Once it's in the bag, the bag won't zip. It may stretch to be 13 inches at the tallest bit, but that isn't what the listing says.Luckily, my wife liked it, and it has now been added to her rotation of purses, otherwise it would have been returned.
